. There are 2 Knebworths - Knebworth and Old Knebworth - situated about 1 mile apart and separated by green fields and the A1(M) motorway. Both are situated between Stevenage (3 miles north) and Welwyn Garden City (5 miles south).  The two are "excluded villages", i.e. built up areas situated in the midst of the Green Belt.

Knebworth is the larger of the 2 towns and extends along the Stevenage to Welwyn Garden City road. The town has local shops, estate agents and pubs.
